training_captions: Cloverleaf-style circularly polarized omni antenna for the C band: four bent-wire petals arranged in a skew planar geometry above a small circular ground disc, fed through a vertical post from an SMA bulkhead.

Skew-planar CP radiator with four curved loops phased for right-hand circular polarization; low-profile ground disc suppresses back radiation while maintaining a near-omnidirectional doughnut pattern and wide fractional bandwidth around 5â€“6 GHz.
Bent-wire CP omni with a central feed post and symmetric petal loop set; RHCP operation, low realized gain, and wide matching bandwidth typical of FPV cloverleaf designs.
